00045 SnpSummaryEngine * SnpSummaryEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00046 {
00047         if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == SnpSummaryEngine::EngineName())
00048                 return (SnpSummaryEngine *)engine;
00049         return NULL;
00050 }

00052 // constructor
00053 SnpSummaryEngine::SnpSummaryEngine() {
00054   defineOptions();
00055 }

00058   clear();
00059 }

00061 void SnpSummaryEngine::clear()
00062 {
00063         chpFiles.clear();  
00064 }

00066 void SnpSummaryEngine::defineOptions() 
00067 {
00068 
00069   defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00070   defineOption("", "chp-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00071                      "Text file specifying chp files to process, one per line with the first line being 'chp_files'.",
00072                      "");
00073 
00074   defineOption("", "call-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00075                      "TSV calls file (table input) from apt-probeset-genotype.",
00076                      "");
00077 
00078    defineOption("b", "buffer-size", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00079                     "Size of buffer used to process files",
00080                     "10000");
00081  
00082   defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00083 
00084   defineOption("", "output-format", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00085           "Set the format of output file:  Valid vales: txt for text output, db for SQLite database format, bin for binary.",
00086                      "txt");
00087 
00088   defineOption("s", "summary-out-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00089                      "Name to use for the output file.",
00090                      "apt-snp-summary.report.txt");
00091 
00092   defineOption("", "files-col", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00093                 "The column name for the input files.",
00094         "chp_files");
00095 
00096   defineOptionSection("Engine Options (Not used on command line)");
00097   defOptMult("", "chps", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00098                      "CHP files to process.",
00099                      "text output");
00100 }

00102 void SnpSummaryEngine::defineStates() { }
00103 
00104 /**
00105  * Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00106  */
00107 void SnpSummaryEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00108 {
00109     defineStates();
00110         string file;
00111         file = getOpt("summary-out-file");
00112         if (file.empty() == true)
00113                 Err::errAbort("Must specify an output summary file.");
00114         if (getOpt("output-format") == "")
00115                 setOpt("output-format", "txt");
00116         std::string outputFormat = getOpt("output-format");
00117         if ((outputFormat != "txt") && (outputFormat != "bin") && (outputFormat != "db"))
00118                 Err::errAbort("Must specify the the format of the output file.  Set the --output option to txt for text output, db for SQLite database format, bin for binary.");
00119     if((outputFormat == "bin") && (getOpt("call-file") != "")) {
00120         Err::errAbort("Cannot use table input with bin output.");
00121     }
00122 
00123         // Read in list files list from other file if specified.
00124     vector<string> chpFiles;
00125     EngineUtil::getChpFiles(chpFiles, this);
00126     for(int i=0; i < chpFiles.size(); i++) {
00127       FsPath chpPath(chpFiles[i]);
00128       if(!chpPath.isReadable()) {
00129         Err::errAbort("Unable to read " + chpFiles[i] + " " + Fs::getErrMsg());
00130       }
00131     }
00132 
00133     if((chpFiles.size() == 0) && getOpt("call-file")=="")
00134         Err::errAbort("No chp files specified.");
00135 
00136         setOpt("chps",chpFiles);
00137 }
00138 
00139 // Compute the various metrics over all chips.
00140 void SnpSummaryEngine::runImp() {
00141 
00142         SnpSummaryReporter reporter;
00143         int size = getOptInt("buffer-size");
00144 
00145         bool rc = reporter.CreateSnpSummaryReport(getOpt("summary-out-file"), getOptVector("chps"), getOpt("output-format"), size, getOpt("call-file"));        
00146     if(!rc)
00147         Err::errAbort("Unable to extract SNP summaries.");
00148 }
